description: '''DJ Spanish Fly''' (born '''Antonio D. Kimbrough''' January 16, 1970) is an American DJ, rapper, writer, and music producer from Memphis, Tennessee. Known as the "Godfather of Memphis Rap," he is credited with pioneering the [[Memphis rap|Memphis rap scene]] and influencing the development of the [[phonk]] genre. DJ Spanish Fly also introduced the "[[jooking]]" dance style.
